storyContent.story: As a **developer**, I want GitHub implemented as the first Git platform, so that I can validate the platform abstraction with the most popular Git hosting service.

acceptanceCriteria.criteria: GitHub provider implements all interface operations from Story 1.4
Provider handles authentication via Personal Access Token (PAT) or GitHub App
Provider integrates with GitHub Actions API for CI/CD triggering
Provider integrates with GitHub Review API for automated review workflows
Unit tests cover happy path, error cases, and GitHub-specific quirks
Integration test demonstrates end-to-end PR creation and merge

tasks.task: Implement GitHub platform class structure Create GitHubPlatform class implementing IGitPlatform Implement initialize() method with authentication setup Implement dispose() method for cleanup
Implement repository operations Implement getRepository() method using GitHub API Implement listIssues() method with filtering support Implement getIssue() method for individual issue retrieval
Implement branch operations Implement createBranch() method using GitHub refs API Implement getBranch() method for branch information Add branch validation and error handling

Implement pull request operations Implement createPullRequest() method using GitHub PR API Implement getPullRequest() method with full PR details Implement updatePullRequest() method for PR modifications Implement mergePullRequest() method with merge strategies
Add authentication and security Implement PAT authentication with token validation Add GitHub App authentication support Implement secure credential storage and rotation
Integrate GitHub Actions and Review APIs Implement triggerCI() method for GitHub Actions Add commentOnPR() method for review workflows Implement getPRStatus() and getChecks() methods
Add pagination and rate limit handling Implement pagination for large result sets Add rate limit detection and handling Implement exponential backoff retry logic

Create comprehensive test suite Write unit tests for happy path scenarios Write unit tests for error cases and GitHub quirks Write integration test for end-to-end PR workflow Add tests for authentication and rate limiting

features.feature: Pagination handling for large result sets
Rate limit awareness with exponential backoff
Webhook signature verification for event handling
GitHub Actions integration for PR checks
GitHub Review API integration for automated workflows

security.requirement: Secure credential storage with encryption at rest

reliability.pattern: Retry logic with exponential backoff for API failures
Circuit breaker for GitHub API calls (5 failures in 60s → open for 300s)
Timeout configuration for all network calls (default 30s)

epic.title: Foundation & Core Infrastructure
epic.goal: Establish foundational architecture decisions and integration capabilities before feature development begins
epic.value: Multi-provider AI flexibility (no vendor lock-in), multi-platform Git support (GitHub, GitLab, Gitea, Forgejo), architectural foundation for autonomous loops

dependencies.dependency: Git Platform Interface Definition must exist

outOfScope.item: Development plan generation and code implementation (Epic 2)
Quality gates, testing automation, and intelligence layer (Epic 3)
Event sourcing backend implementation and audit trail (Epic 4)
